section.title: Synopsis
section.codeblock: #include <string.h> void* memcpy(void *out, const void *in, size_t n);

section.title: Description
section.p: This function copies n bytes from the memory region pointed to by in to the memory region pointed to by out.
If the regions overlap, the behavior is undefined.

section.title: Returns
section.p: memcpy returns a pointer to the first byte of the out region.
